AI Description: Pysam is a Python module that provides access to read, write, manipulate, and analyze SAM/BAM files used in bioinformatics. It allows seamless integration of SAMtools, a set of utilities for interacting with and post-processing short DNA sequence read alignments in SAM, BAM, or CRAM format.
Core Features: Read & Write Sam/Bam Files, Manipulate Read Alignments, Analyze Sequence Data, Integration With Samtools Utilities
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Sequence Analysis, Sam/Bam Files, Python Module
